Healing.Name: Common Healing Potion
Healing.Description: A simple potion that can restore a small amount of health.

Healing.Name: Common Healing Salve
Healing.Description: A basic salve that can heal wounds and restore health.

Healing.Name: Common Health Draught
Healing.Description: A standard health draught that can recover a moderate amount of health.

Healing.Name: Senzu Bean
Healing.Description: A magical bean that can fully restore a person's health and energy.

Healing.Name: Specialised Healing Ball
Healing.Description: A dragon ball that, when collected with six others, can grant a wish for full health restoration.

Healing.Name: Healing Earring
Healing.Description: A powerful item that can instantly heal and grant the wearer increased power and health.

Armor.Name: Majin Armor
Armor.Description: Armor infused with the power of the Majin race, providing increased strength and durability.

Armor.Name: Namekian Helmet
Armor.Description: Armor made from the durable skin of the Namekian race, providing increased defense and resistance.

Armor.Name: Saiyan Armor
Armor.Description: Armor made from advanced Saiyan technology, providing increased power and resistance to energy attacks.

Armor.Name: Time Breaker Bottom
Armor.Description: A powerful and ancient armor that can manipulate time and grant immense power to the wearer.

Armor.Name: Weighted Clothing
Armor.Description: Heavy clothing that can increase the wearer's strength and power.
